trend_alignment.description: Whether higher timeframe trend matches direction

breakout_strength.description: Strength score of breakout based on candle body vs wick

multi_tap_score.description: Confidence score for multiple touches on support/resistance zone

atr_ratio.description: Volatility normalization; signal range vs ATR

doji.description: Presence of indecision candle at breakout

volatility_score.description: Normalized volatility score used in signal

pivot_zone.description: Was breakout near a known pivot zone?

zone_tap_count.description: Number of taps on support/resistance zone
